title: Is it normal for a New pixel 3a to die from a full charge in only 5 1/2 hours on low power mode?
content: The past 2 full charges I have only gotten no longer than 6 hours use out of my new pixel 3a and this is with low power mode turned on? it suggests that it will run for ~20 hours but doesn't even get close? is this normal for a new pixel, I just feel like this is a bit short for battery life for a new phone.
